column4: On the ubuntu livecd, how can a person get quickly to a console window?
I need to explain to someone over the phone, and I use kubuntu, not ubuntu
all she could do is destroy what she wants to destroy..
alt+F2 then type gnome-terminal and enter, "sudo -i" is the command to use for root session
i didn't think alt-f2 worked in gnome?
it invokes the gnome-run-application window per default
